Exec.Command: echo "ApplicationIcon = '$(ApplicationIcon)'" echo "AssemblyName = '$(AssemblyName)'" echo "BuildInParallel = $(BuildInParallel)" echo "Configuration = '$(Configuration)'" echo "DebugType = '$(DebugType)'" echo "Deterministic = $(Deterministic)" echo "DevEnvDir = '$(DevEnvDir)'" echo "DirectoryBuildPropsPath = '$(DirectoryBuildPropsPath)'" echo "DirectoryBuildTargetsPath = '$(DirectoryBuildTargetsPath)'" echo "DocumentationFile = '$(DocumentationFile)'" echo "ImportDirectoryBuildProps = $(ImportDirectoryBuildProps)" echo "ImportDirectoryBuildTargets = $(ImportDirectoryBuildTargets)" echo "MSBuildTreatWarningsAsErrors = '$(MSBuildTreatWarningsAsErrors)'" echo "MSBuildWarningsAsErrors = '$(MSBuildWarningsAsErrors)'" echo "MSBuildWarningsAsMessages = '$(MSBuildWarningsAsMessages)'" echo "NoLogo = $(NoLogo)" echo "NoStdLib = $(NoStdLib)" echo "NoWarn = '$(NoWarn)'" echo "Optimize = $(Optimize)" echo "OptionExplicit = $(OptionExplicit)" echo "OptionInfer = $(OptionInfer)" echo "OptionStrict = $(OptionStrict)" echo "OutDir = '$(OutDir)'" echo "OutputPath = '$(OutputPath)'" echo "OutputType = '$(OutputType)'" echo "Platform = '$(Platform)'" echo "ProcessorArchitecture = '$(ProcessorArchitecture)'" echo "ProduceReferenceOnlyAssembly = $(ProduceReferenceOnlyAssembly)" echo "ProductReferenceAssembly = $(ProductReferenceAssembly)" echo "ProjectDir = '$(ProjectDir)'" echo "ProjectPath = '$(ProjectPath)'" echo "ProjectName = '$(ProjectName)'" echo "ProjectFileName = '$(ProjectFileName)'" echo "ProjectExt = '$(ProjectExt)'" echo "RootNameSpace = '$(RootNameSpace)'" echo "SolutionDir = '$(SolutionDir)'" echo "SolutionPath = '$(SolutionPath)'" echo "SolutionName = '$(SolutionName)'" echo "SolutionFileName = '$(SolutionFileName)'" echo "SolutionExt = '$(SolutionExt)'" echo "TargetFramework = '$(TargetFramework)'" echo "TargetFrameworkVersion = '$(TargetFrameworkVersion)'" echo "TreatWarningsAsErrors = $(TreatWarningsAsErrors)" echo "Utf8Output = $(Utf8Output)" echo "WarningsAsErrors = '$(WarningsAsErrors)'" echo "WarningLevel = '$(WarningLevel)'" echo "WarningsNotAsErrors = '$(WarningsNotAsErrors)'" echo "pwd = '$$(pwd)'"
